product_name: The North Face Warm Boot-Top Long Underwear Bottoms - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Warm Boot-Top Long Underwear bottoms provide maximum thermal protection, and feature a capri length that's perfect for use when wearing your ski or snowboard boots. Moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut shells and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. 3/4-length legs; flatlock seams; elastic waist. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Warm Boot-Top Long Underwear bottoms provide maximum thermal protection, and feature a capri length that's perfect for use when wearing your ski or snowboard boots.
